definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A polished tourmaline from India gleams.
sentences.chinese: 這是一顆來自印度的經打磨後光潔的電氣石。

sentences.english: Uses the natural mineral material tourmaline made by superfine processing.
sentences.chinese: 採用天然礦物材料電氣石通過超細加工精製而成。

sentences.english: A piece of black tourmaline crystal. Transmutes negative energies.
sentences.chinese: 一塊黑色電氣石，它可以轉化負面的能量。

sentences.english: The natural tourmalines' color is diversity and its genesis is complexity.
sentences.chinese: 天然電氣石顏色多種多樣，顏色成因非常複雜。
